Custom Boilerplate: Bonne Nuit

A custom boilerplate that uses Dart-Sass, Flexbox, and Node.js from the HTML5 Boilerplate base. This is an example of an H2 style.

This is an example of a paragraph inside of an article. All font sizes are response, but this one is the smallest.

Blog Style Boilerplate

Another paragraph. This one is separated by a header in the H3 style.

Garamond and Helvetica

These are the main two font families used in the styling. Serif for headers, sans serif for paragraphs and nav.

Sometimes you want a picture or two.

Image embeds are centered, and sized to fit inside the main article.

Last header!

Here's a bunch of text at once. My favorite color is blue, so I wanted an overall cool toned palette, with custom black and white colors to not use the exact #ffffff and #000000 values. This way it's easier on the eyes, but still has good contrast between the base colors. Of course, if you don't like this palette, the use of Dart-Sass makes it easy to replace any base colors with preferred ones.

This is the footer.
